Html:
I notice that when I'm using a two-handed item I can't see items that are one-hand. How can I fix this?

For instance I'm using Dying Light, but would like to compare it to Frozen Bonespike and show offhand options.
Equip an offhand. Then you'll see 1H and 2H items in the main hand chart, comparing the 2Hs to the 1H+OH.
